final_answer:
The image is humorous and satirical because it creatively highlights an ironic situation involving common technology use. On the left, the "YES" side shows a typical scenario where a power bank is successfully charging a phone. This is a straightforward and expected use of a power bank.

On the right, the "BUT" side depicts a nonsensical situation where a depleted power bank and an empty phone are connected to each other, unable to provide any charge. This is ironic because both devices are powerless and thus cannot fulfill their intended purpose, which is to charge the phone. The absurdity of attempting to use an uncharged power bank to charge an empty phone illustrates a humorous take on the ineffectiveness sometimes found in technology.
